body:
I think everyone is for "law and order."  The problem is everyone is also ok with disorder when it helps their side.  Unfortunately the left is fine with letting criminals off after they loot a store or burn down a police station, but when someone on the right burns a "blm banner," suddenly the politicians and cops are out in force to arrest someone and charge them.  Fuck everyone who had their business looted, or cars burned down...that was what the left wanted, but the right performs a meaningless act with destruction of property worth less than 20 bucks, and the FBI is on the case.  Where the fuck is the consistency?  

You can't expect people to respect the "rule of law" when they're getting their neighborhoods destroyed and the criminals let go as hero's, while they're getting charged for tearing down the offenders banners.

post.body:
Don't matter if you BLM, MAGA, Antifa, Proud Boys, Neo-Nazi, Communist, or the KKK if you doing shit like whats happening in DC right now, force should be applied indiscriminately to restore law and order.

Whats happening right now is unacceptable, those involved should be arrested and the ones that resist... well.... we don't have a place in society for you.

This is an invasion and an attempt coup. This is unacceptable. This must be stopped now with force. Left, Right, Up, Down, Red, White, Blue, or Brown if you support this, fuck you!
